verses.verse: And Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559> unto me <WH3212>, Go again <WH157>, love a woman <WH802> beloved <WH157> of her friend <WH7453>, and an adulteress <WH5003>, even as Jehovah <WH3068> loveth <WH160> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, though they turn <WH6437> unto other <WH312> gods <WH430>, and love <WH157> cakes <WH809> of raisins <WH6025>.
So I bought <WH3739> her to me for fifteen <WH6240> pieces of silver <WH3701>, and a homer <WH2563> of barley <WH8184>, and a half-homer <WH3963> of barley <WH8184>;

and I said <WH559> unto her <WH3427>, Thou shalt abide for me many <WH7227> days <WH3117>; thou shalt not play the harlot <WH2181>, and thou shalt not be <WH1961> any man <WH376>'s wife: so will I also be toward thee.

For the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> shall abide <WH3427> many <WH7227> days <WH3117> without king <WH4428>, and without prince <WH8269>, and without sacrifice <WH2077>, and without pillar <WH4676>, and without ephod <WH646> or teraphim <WH8655>:

afterward <WH310> shall the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> return <WH7725>, and seek <WH1245> Jehovah <WH3068> their God <WH430>, and David <WH1732> their king <WH4428>, and shall come with fear <WH6342> unto Jehovah <WH3068> and to his goodness <WH2898> in the latter <WH319> days <WH3117>.
